title: Team Fawlty
author: Tom W. Hartung
card_content_html:
These images of the personalities of the main characters on the show Fawlty Towers are all colorful, showing the individuals are all fairly versatile. These portraits also show each character has their own unique strengths and weaknesses.

The four form a diverse team, their versatility and diversity combining to enable them to take care of all of the duties required to run the small, quaint hotel near England's southern coast. They manage to achieve many amazing feats — even if making a Waldorf Salad isn't one of them.
card_first_person_html:
Monty Python's John Cleese is the creator, writer and star of Fawlty Towers, and it is #1 on the British Film Institute's list of Top 100 TV Shows.

The entire series consists of just two seasons of six episodes each, for a total of twelve 30-40 minute episodes — making it a cinch for even the busiest people to watch!
